articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Coronavirus continues to spread across Asia and Europe
articles.description: South Korea has the highest known amount of contamination outside China with around 1,000 cases. In Europe, Italy is the hardest hit with at least 10 deaths.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: CDC warns Americans of coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: The coronavirus is spreading so quickly around the globe, it may only be a matter of time before it begins rolling across the U.S. with the potential to become a pandemic, according to the CDC.

articles.author: Suzanne Ciechalski and Mohammed Syed and Sasha Urban
articles.title: U.S. students on study abroad in China left scrambling by coronavirus
articles.description: “We know the one thing you can't buy back is actual time,” said Michael Cheun, whose daughter had to take a semester off once her program was canceled.
articles.content:
Some American college students who are in study abroad programs in China say their education is in limbo as that nation grapples with the coronavirus outbreak that has killed more than 2,600 across the globe over the past three months.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: CDC warns Americans: Prepare for coronavirus
articles.description: CDC officials say Americans should expect disruptions including school closings, working from home and delayed elective medical procedures after warning that coronavirus spread to the U.S. is inevitable.  NBC's Sarah Dallof reports.

articles.author: Lucy Bayly
articles.title: Dow falls by 900 points for second day straight as coronavirus spreads
articles.description: Wall Street plunged for a second straight day on Tuesday, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropping by more than 900 points in mid-afternoon trading.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Watch: Coronavirus symptom plagues Iranian official on live TV
articles.description: During an address carried live on TV, Iran's deputy health minister, Iraj Harirchi, is seen aggressively wiping sweat from his brow in what turned out to be a fever caused by coronavirus COVID-19.

articles.title: Coronavirus could leave only 3 months to decide fate of Tokyo Olympics
articles.description: The modern Olympics dating from 1896 have only been cancelled during wartime, and faced boycotts in 1976 in Montreal, in 1980 in Moscow and 1984 in Los Angeles.
articles.content:
